source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_SEQ_00<tab>Tsuranuki has seen your kind before.
target: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_SEQ_00<tab>クサカリの里のツラヌキは、ヘラヘラと冒険者たちを眺めている。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TODO_00<tab>Use the makeshift bombs to demolish abandoned magitek.
target: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F51E8D01 /var>を使い<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA37601 /var>を破壊

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TODO_02<tab>Use the makeshift bombs to demolish abandoned magitek.
target: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F51E8D01 /var>を使い<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA37701 /var>を破壊

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the armor plating to Tsuranuki.
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>The Dairyu Moon Gates have guarded the approach to Doma Castle since long before the imperial occupation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ALPHINAUD_000_006大龍壁も月亮門も、もともとは、
城に出入りする船を管理するために、
ドマの民が作り上げたものだそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ALPHINAUD_000_007<tab>We do not anticipate any great difficulty in gaining entry to the gatehouse as our Doman friends know its every nook and cranny. The challenge will come in preserving the element of surprise. But I am confident the shinobi will rise to the occasion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ALPHINAUD_000_007ゆえに、侵入自体はそれほど難しくない。
あとは敵がどれだけ配備されているかだが……
忍びたちの手も借りて、必ず魔導障壁を解除してみせよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_YUGIRI_000_008<tab>During the rebellion, the imperials turned to their agents among the shinobi, and through their treachery were many of my comrades slaughtered.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_YUGIRI_000_0081年前の反乱の折、忍びの里からも、帝国に寝返る者が出た。
そのせいもあって、里にも大きな被害が出てな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_YUGIRI_000_009<tab>We few who survived have not forgotten that day. The memory of it has spurred us never to neglect our training, that we might be ready to administer revenge.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_YUGIRI_000_009今も残っている忍びたちは、
あの日の無念を胸に抱いて、再び忠義を誓い、
鍛練を積んできた者たちなのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_010<tab>Eh? Say again? You would have me fashion armor for villagers who wish to fight imperial regulars?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_010で……なんでぇ？
帝国兵と戦うために、村人が鎧う防具がほしいってぇ？

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_011<tab>Bwahahaha! Mad fools charging boldly to meet their deaths! Bring me steel and I shall give them shells to shield their soft bellies.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_011あひゃひゃひゃひゃ！
死ににいくのに防具がほしいたぁ、阿呆かい！？
どうしてもってんなら、鉄板でも腹に仕込んでな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_012<tab>Yes, yes, plates of steel, all that you can carry. The better to shield them from blade and bullet!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_012おうおう、男ツラヌキ、鉄材を持ってきてくれりゃ、
腹巻みたいな鉄板をこさえてやんよぉ！
あひゃひゃっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_013<tab>If only it were so simple, Master Tsuranuki. Steel plates are not so easily procured─
target: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_013<tab>いや、ツラヌキさん、鉄材なんてそう簡単には……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_014<tab>Blind, deaf, and dumb you are, boy! We are awash in broken steel. Magitek, great cylinders come crashing to the earth from on high!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_014この阿呆！　とんちき！　大うつけ！
帝国の魔導兵器の残骸が、そこかしこにあるじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_015<tab>Shatter them to bits with my explosives. They will not fail you, for I made them to kill imperials, heh heh! Bring me my steel, and you will have your armor.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_015そぉれ、じじい特製の爆弾をくれてやらぁ！
帝国兵を殺すために作ったもんだから、威力は折り紙つき！
こいつで兵器を爆破して、「」をとってきな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_LYSE_000_016<tab>...Well, it's not like we know any other armorers who can help. At least we get to blow things up!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_LYSE_000_016言い方はともかく、鉄板をおなかに仕込むってのは手だね。
ほかに頼れそうな相手もいないんだ、
手分けして「」を集めてこよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_020<tab>Of course, the imperials have explosives too, and there is no armor which can protect you from that. Bwahahaha!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_020ま、どこに鉄板を仕込もうが、死ぬときゃ死ぬがねぇ！
あひゃひゃひゃひゃ！
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_LYSE_000_030<tab>こっちも、装甲板を集めてきたよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_035<tab>We're lucky no patrols overheard the explosions...
target: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_035<tab>帝国兵に見つかるんじゃないかって、ひやひやしたぞ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_040<tab>Eh? Eh!? You have the many plates of steel I demanded? Show me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_040ひゃーっ！　なんてぇこった！
おめぇまで、本気で装甲板を集めてきたのかい！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_041<tab>Bwahahaha! Then you are committed to your cause! Dressing villagers as soldiers and marching off to war...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_041あひゃひゃひゃ！
なんでぇ、本気で村人どもを引き連れて、
戦いに行く気だってのかい！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_042<tab>Stupid, stupid fools! Doma is dead, and so are her people!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_042やめとけ、やめとけ！
ドマは死んだ、みんな死んだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_043<tab>Lord Kaien, Lord Hien─all dead! Their blood is on our hands!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_043カイエン様だって、若様だって……
このじじいたちが殺したんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_044<tab>'Twas Lord Kaien who saved us. Who spared us the worst when the Garleans came.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_044ドマはなぁ、この25年間、確かに帝国の属州だった……。
それでもこの国の色が残っているのは、カイエン様のおかげよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_045<tab>Every shred of pride and honor he cast aside, without a second thought! All to win their trust. All to serve as their puppet. Restored to his throne years later, a paper tiger.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_045帝国の連中は、思想の違うオレたちを支配するため、
ドマを属州としてから数年後に、カイエン様を復権させた。
実際は何の権限も持たない、仮初の殿君としてな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_046<tab>Such shame he must have felt, but no matter! He would suffer it for his people. A life as slaves is better than none at all, he believed. But not us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_046あの方は、それを承知の上で、
少しでもドマを残すために、根気よく働きかけ続けた。
……オレたちは、それが辛くてねぇ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_047<tab>After my lady died, we began to whisper in his ears dreams of freedom and liberation. We pushed him to take action, if only a little...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_047カイエン様の奥方様が、
長年の心労で亡くなられたのをきっかけに、
ここぞとばかり、反乱の計画を持ちかけたのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_048<tab>Ten years of preparation, of machinations. So careful we would be, and yet...and yet!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_048以後、約10年……
念入りに準備を重ねたが、最後は知ってのとおりの惨敗だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_049<tab>Doma burned for our foolishness, not for that of Lord Kaien. Monzen, the enclave─they were razed for our sins! We murdered them all, don't you see? We murdered you all!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_049カイエン様は、こんなじじいたちを生かすため、
業火に煙る町人地で討たれた。
そのときドマは終わった、ああ、終わっちまったんだ……ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_050<tab>...You're wrong, Master. We are still here. We are still alive.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_050……勝手に終わらせるなよ。
まだ先はある、そのために俺たちは戦うって決めたんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_051<tab>Lord Kaien too lives on. In our hearts, and in his son, for Lord Hien has returned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_ISSE_000_051それに、カイエン様の遺したものも、まだ消えちゃいない。
若様を、こいつらが連れ帰ってくれたんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_052<tab>Lord Hien? Alive!? It cannot be. You lie. You lie!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_052ヒエン様を……！？
そんな……おい、冗談じゃねぇだろうなッ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_LYSE_000_053<tab>It's the truth! Hien came back to Doma to help her fight for freedom!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_LYSE_000_053冗談なんかじゃない。
ヒエンは戻ってきてる、ドマのために戦うつもりで！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_054<tab>Could...could it be? My lord Hien yet lives? Oh...oh...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_054ああ……ああ……！
なんてこった……本当に、そんなことが……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_055<tab>Bands of steel to bind the chest and belly, yes, yes! I must heat the forge and begin work at once!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_055なら、こうしちゃいられねぇ！
皆を守る黒金の腹当、打たせてもらおうじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_056<tab>Ten? One hundred? How many do you need? All that and more you shall have!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA510_02947_TSURANUKI_000_056必要なのは、10か？　100か？
いくつでもかまわねぇ、このツラヌキのじじいが打つッ！
若ぇの、ちょいと手伝いな！
